scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Christ, identifiable by his halo, dressed in a blue robe, standing next to a donkey. He is gesturing towards a figure in a red tunic who is seated in a tree, seemingly reaching for something. To Christ's left, several faces are visible, suggesting onlookers. In the foreground, a man in a green tunic is attending to a donkey laden with a bundle. A group of men, one in an orange robe and another in a pink robe, stand to the right, observing the scene. The background features stylized trees and a patterned textile, suggesting an outdoor setting with decorative elements.
